b: ^Plenty of loot for me, then! I'll get those barrels before you do.
^Well, human. You've caught on to my way of life. I see you're breaking barrels too!
^There's good loot hiding in them. But not quite enough to go around. You'd better not take too many and leave some for me!
^Seems like you're going to be competition. But I'll always be faster, nyehehe.
^Well, human! You've broken a total of
^You're stealing my livelihood! Stop breaking those barrels!!!
^The harvests lately have been poor, and we don't have enough food to go around...
